linkedinData.description: MS in Software Engineering @ San Jose State University | Building MockerView
linkedinData.name: Divik Shrivastava
linkedinData.aboutSummaryText:
Having worked as a Full Stack Developer in a startup environment, particularly in backend, I have learned how to design, develop, restore, maintain, test and evaluate various software projects. Experienced in understanding and drafting code structure and architectures, and adopting an innovative and solution-oriented approach to cater for the organizational requirements. Skilled in building and maintaining performance optimized features, with good exposure to security standards. Highly skilled in communication, collaboration, and technical documentation.

Programming Languages: Javascript, Typescript, Python, C++,  Java, SQL, C, PHP
Web Tech: React.js, Angular.js, Nest.js, Next.js, Express.js, Node.js, HTML, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, RabbitMQ
Cloud/Dev-Ops: AWS (Elastic Beanstalk, S3, Load Balancer, RDS, EC2, Lambda, DynamoDB), Azure, RESTful microservices, CI/CD, Ansible, HLD/LLD
Other: Git, Jira, Agile, SpiraTest, Spring Boot, Hibernate, CUDA, Postman, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Flask, Docker, Kubernetes, Linux.

experience.description: I work here as a technical trainee where I work on automation of CIS controls and add applicability support of various servers, databases, etc to SAFE web.
experience.title: SDE Intern

experience.description: I worked here as a data science intern where my aim was to perform sentiment analysis on appraisal process and sort out the related comments into positive, negative or neutral nature using Bi LSTM and various corpuses.
experience.title: Data Science Intern

experience.description: I worked here for over a month where my day to day job included discovering various security tools and after through hands-on experience document and analyse their data regarding their uses and methods so as to familiarise a system with their affects. Finally I worked with experts who mentored me on how the machine is made to learn so as to prevent future attacks.
experience.title: Cyber Security Analyst

certifications.title: Intermediate ML: TensorFlow on Google Cloud
